markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Two-Weapon Fusillade](/Feats.aspx?ID=3203) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117) (Level 16)

**Requirements**
You're wielding two weapons, each in a different hand. At least one of these weapons must be a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow.

</column>

---

You attack with both your weapons in a furious barrage. Strike twice, once with each weapon.
name: Two-Weapon Fusillade
requirement: You're wielding two weapons, each in a different hand. At least one of these weapons must be a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow.
